mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(email, password, name, nickname, is_nav, birth, user_language, nation, image, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{is_nav}, #{birth}, #{user_language}, #{nation}, #{image}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(email) > 0 FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT * FROM user WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
